metadata.title: CVE-2024-50602 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.4. There is a crash withinthe XML_ResumeParser function because XML_StopParser can stop/suspend anunstarted parser.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.4.7-1ubuntu0.5
libexpat1 - 2.4.7-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1ubuntu0.5').
xmlrpc-c package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
gdcm package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
